author: Ottavio Monzione
title: ChainEscrow - On-chain escrow dApp
description: Exchanging goods and services always require the parties to have some kind of trust in each other, sometimes causing unexpected outcomes

assessments.note: The described escrow App would definetly add a lot of value to the cardano ecosystem. As the Cardano NFT (CNFT) market comes to live there will be a huge demand for an easy and safe escrow service.

This is a powerful engine that is able to enhance the reliability of the Cardano`s network. The creation of a escrow dApp is very important to allow the healthu growth of the community.
However, I missed some metrics and goals – what do you expect that the community earn with this proposal (more reliability, members, dapps, etc)?
assessments.reply: The user here is highlighting a lack of metrics and goals. I think I've broken down quite extensivily short and long term roadmap and timeline, together with milestone's achievements

assessments.note: An escrow account looks to be one of the missing piece in bridging between fully decentralized ecosystem with commerce that requires physical goods delivery. This proposal address that gap.

The presented roadmap seems very plausible and well thought of. The team behind the proposal seems very driven and competent.
There is little to no doubt in my mind that this project will be realized if it is being funded.

I've not understood how are you going to achieve the further development required in the platform after the first 3 months of fund. Since you have not asked for the entire funding and gave no expectations of ROI, it is not clear how are you going to implement it. Let's assume that you don't have lots of trades happening after the launch of MVP, which is plausible, how are you going to make money to further dev.?
assessments.reply: As highlighted on the proposal and the comments in the proposal: All the collected transaction fees will be used to support the development of the platform & Build a tokenomics model for the release of a native asset on the Cardano platform related to the project

assessments.note: The initial request which will cover 3 months of development doesn't seem to be a big ask, especially with two developers on board (including plutus pioneer participant). If there's any concern, it will be around the support for the project going forward, things will need to be hashed out in how to support the project 2,5,10 years down the road.

The proposal gives the reader a good understanding on how the whole project and implementation would take place.
Even the technical challenges are well explained. You can clearly understand where the challenges and opportunities lie.
Without a dispute resolution process this can't work. Plan should include that from the outset or funds will get stranded in smart contracts.
assessments.reply: The proposal hasn't been read/understood completely. He outlines the lack of a dispute resolution problem. I am tackling this issue in the roadmap as a future feature but that's not needed for the MVP for which I am requesting fund for

assessments.note: It is missing metrics and KPI in this proposal and I wish you had detailed a little bit more the roadmap and include some milestones.
assessments.reply: Two assesment have been made by the same community advisor. He complains for a lack of KPI and milestones in the roadmap which is not the case in my opinion since I've broken down the roadmap and detailed each and every milestone within 12 months timespan

assessments.note: A good success measure will still need to be define to ensure we can track the success of this proposal, such as user community size, # of contracts written for the escrow.
assessments.reply: I don't agree with the user's comment about the lack of metrics and definition of success. The definition of success in this case is the fact that the MVP will be deployed on mainnet within 3 months.

solution: Create a simple yet powerful escrow dApp on Cardano which will enable the onchain exchange of goods and services in a trustless manner
experience: IT Software Engineers with 10y+ of experience in the traditional fintech space. Cardano enthusiasts and long term hodlers. Plutus Pioneers.
